english: She told him all her terrible problems .
chinese: 她向他诉说了她的一切烦恼。

english: This will reimburse you for your trouble .
chinese: 这就是对你的烦恼的赔偿。

english: There was no languor in her now .
chinese: 这时候她身上的烦恼已经无影无踪。

english: His annoyance showed itself in his face .
chinese: 从他的脸上可以看出他有烦恼。

english: There never was such a cross family !
chinese: 从未见过一个这么烦恼的家呀！
烦恼造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Don't trouble yourself with such a trifle .
chinese: 不要因为这样的小事而烦恼。

english: You've got to accept a little sorrow in life .
Do not let his criticisms bother you .
chinese: 别因为他批评你而感到烦恼。

english: Mother was much perturbed by my illness .
chinese: 我的病使母亲甚感烦恼。

english: This deeper anxiety swallowed them up .
chinese: 更大的烦恼把它们淹没了。

english: This deeper anxiety swallowed them up .
chinese: 更大的烦恼把他们淹没了。

english: Sweet sir-leave me to my sorrows .
chinese: 好心的人儿唷，我的烦恼让我自己承担吧。

english: Anxiety and distress gnawed at his heart .
Do not let the incident get you down too much .
chinese: 别让这事搅得你过于烦恼了。
爱是宜人的，怨恨则令人烦恼。
